ingredient_usage_patterns.description: Posts discussing how biotin is used in routines and protocols

top_examples.title: [Anti-Aging] I may have used too much retinol and sunscreen. Maybe I should add some biotin for my thinning hair?
Almost 1 year post op ….haven’t had this much hair since I was 18….regimen…topical fin/min viviscal…biotin…sulfate free shampoo/nizoral 3 times a week
My results of about 6 months of minoxidil + head massages + biotin + all around taking care of my body and hair.

10.5 months. Oral propecia, topical minoxidil (once daily) derma roller. And for the last two (2) months, I've been doing the bald showers after leg workouts... Biotin and Omega 3 age 35. Loses a lot of hair a day, over 150

Oral Biotin and Topical Minoxidil have a synergy effect in increasing hair growth, the study was only done in healthy subjects and it was only 14 days but it does prove that biotin can play a significant role as an adjunct treatment.
